meanings.definition: A book in which a depositor's transactions are recorded by the bank.
meanings.sent1: I keep my savings in my passbooks.
meanings.sent2: The bank clerk stamped my passbooks after each deposit.
meanings.sent3: My passbooks are like a financial diary.
meanings.sent4: Her passbooks tell the story of her financial journey.
meanings.sent5: The passbooks hold the key to my financial history.

meanings.definition: A book issued by a transportation company for a single journey.
meanings.sent1: I handed my passbooks to the conductor on the bus.
meanings.sent2: The passbooks for the train ride were expensive.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my passbooks on the bus seat!
meanings.sent4: His passbooks were the ticket to his adventure.
meanings.sent5: The passbooks were the gateway to my travel experience.
